name: narduk-games
description: A monorepo for all Narduk games

scripts.lexi-stack:build:subdir: cd games/lexi-stack && VITE_BASE_PATH=/lexistack/ npm run build
scripts.wordle-clone:build:subdir: cd games/wordle-clone && VITE_BASE_PATH=/wordle/ npm run build
scripts.stack-balance:build:subdir: cd games/stack-balance && VITE_BASE_PATH=/stack-balance/ npm run build
scripts.potprefix:build:subdir: cd games/potprefix && VITE_BASE_PATH=/potprefix/ npm run build
scripts.tapweave:build:subdir: cd games/tapweave && VITE_BASE_PATH=/tapweave/ npm run build
scripts.2048-clone:build:subdir: cd games/2048-clone && VITE_BASE_PATH=/2048/ npm run build
scripts.traffic-bench:build:subdir: cd games/traffic-bench && VITE_BASE_PATH=/traffic-bench/ npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:lexi-stack && npm run install:wordle-clone && npm run install:stack-balance && npm run install:potprefix && npm run install:tapweave && npm run install:2048-clone && npm run install:traffic-bench
scripts.build:all: npm run lexi-stack:build && npm run wordle-clone:build && npm run stack-balance:build && npm run potprefix:build && npm run tapweave:build && npm run 2048-clone:build && npm run traffic-bench:build
scripts.build:all:subdir: npm run lexi-stack:build:subdir && npm run wordle-clone:build:subdir && npm run stack-balance:build:subdir && npm run potprefix:build:subdir && npm run tapweave:build:subdir && npm run 2048-clone:build:subdir && npm run traffic-bench:build:subdir
scripts.test:all: npm run lexi-stack:test && npm run wordle-clone:test && npm run stack-balance:test && npm run potprefix:test && npm run tapweave:test && npm run 2048-clone:test && npm run traffic-bench:test
